actions.text: Amendment SA 396 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 89.

Amendment SA 396 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration:  CR S4349-4351; text:  CR S4350) To help rural health care providers and hospitals receive a fair reimbursement for services under Medicare by reducing tax cuts to the wealthiest income brackets.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 396 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 89.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 396 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 89.

purpose: To help rural health care providers and hospitals receive a fair reimbursement for services under Medicare by reducing tax cuts to the wealthiest income brackets.
